#Star Wars Battlefront II
#FIFA 18

Live: http://www.xbox.com/en-US/e3

重頭戲: Project Scorpio發佈會
~ >90分鐘

已知出展遊戲:
#State of Decay 2

唔知會唔會有:
#Sea of Thieves
#Crackdown 3
#Forza 7

Live: https://www.twitch.tv/bethesda

唔知會唔會有:
#Doom, Elder Scrolls, Dishonored, Prey, Quake Champions, Fallout 系列新消息?
#新作?

Live: https://www.ubisoft.com/en-GB/event/e3-2017-pre/

#Assassin's Creed: Origins
#Far Cry 5
#The Crew 2
#South Park: The Fractured But Whole

#Mario x Rabbids: Kingdom Battle
#The Division Update

Live: https://www.playstation.com/en-au/e3/

已知出展遊戲:
#Days Gone
#God of War
#Uncharted: The Lost Legacy
#Spider-Man
#Gran Turismo Sport
#日廠大作

#Horizon: Zero Dawn DLC
#Knack 2
#Everybody's Golf
#The Last of Us 2
#VR Games?
#FF7RE, KH3?
